column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: A fire broke out in a disused shop at 10 pm on February 13
column8: Phnom Penh.------People who witnessed the incident used water and fire extinguishers
column9: before six firefighters from the Phnom Penh Municipal Commissioner arrived at the scene.------It is reported that the building was often used by homeless people and drug addicts. ------KPT
